name: PIankids - Musical Instruments for Kids
description:
Piankids is a piano for little kids that includes sounds and illustrations of cute musical instruments, with this app your kids will gonna learn the different sounds of each instrument.

This version includes a musical scale of this instruments: Drum, Flute, Guitar, Harp, Music Box, Sax, Violin and Xylophone.

You can also switch musical scale format on settings.

Enjoy it!
